name: firmware
description: PlatformIO firmware workspace for Open-JII IoT devices (ESP32-S3)

scripts.check-pio: command -v pio >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'PlatformIO CLI not found. Install: brew install platformio  or  pip install platformio' && exit 1)
scripts.install: pnpm run check-pio && pio pkg install -d sketches/sensor-node
scripts.install:all: pnpm run check-pio && for d in sketches/*/; do pio pkg install -d "$d"; done
scripts.build: pnpm run check-pio && pio run -d sketches/sensor-node
scripts.build:all: pnpm run check-pio && for d in sketches/*/; do pio run -d "$d"; done
scripts.upload: pnpm run check-pio && pio run -d sketches/sensor-node -t upload
scripts.monitor: pnpm run check-pio && pio device monitor --baud 115200 --echo
scripts.devices: pnpm run check-pio && pio device list
scripts.clean: for d in sketches/*/; do rm -rf "${d}.pio"; done
